section.title: What is Vex
section.para:
Vex is an Open Source plug-in for the
Eclipse
that augments the IDE with a WYSIWYG XML editor. Since August 2008 the plug-in is part of the Eclipse project.

section.title: Installation
section.para: You can install Vex via an Eclipse update site:

section.title: Usage
section.para: To switch between the standard Eclipse XML editor and Vex, do a right-click on the file in the Project Explorer and select Visual XML Editor.
The plug-in is helpful as a quick preview, but still a work in progress. At the time of writing, embedded text via XInclude is just ignored.
